name: Ahmed Bahaa
headline: Flutter Developer • Firebase • BLoC/Cubit • REST APIs
location: Minya Al Qamh, Al Sharqia, Egypt
summary: Flutter Developer with 1 year of hands-on experience building mobile apps with Flutter/Dart using Provider and BLoC/Cubit. Experienced with Firebase (Auth, Firestore, Storage, FCM) and integrating REST APIs. Familiar with Node.js/Express and MongoDB through project work (bookmark sync API). Strong CS foundation (Data Structures, Algorithms, OOP) and Agile workflows.

highlights: Completed practical tasks in ML concepts, data processing, and Python tooling.
Worked on mini projects applying AI techniques to real-world problems.
Supported technical/operational activities and assisted engineers.
Improved teamwork, communication, and problem-solving in a production environment.

projects.title: News App
projects.description: News reader with Firebase auth + advanced UX + synced bookmarks API using Node.js/Express and MongoDB.

projects.title: Production E-Commerce App
projects.description: E-commerce app built with Clean Architecture + Repository pattern and modular Cubits for scalable flows.

projects.title: Shop Store (Graduation Project)
projects.description: Store app with admin CRUD, orders, and image uploads using Firebase backend services.
